card.name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
card.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red

card.name: Akroma's Devoted
card.text: Cleric creatures have vigilance.

card.name: Aphetto Exterminator
card.text: Morph {3}{B} When Aphetto Exterminator is turned face up, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Aven Redeemer
card.text: Flying {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Aven Warhawk
card.text: Amplify 1 Flying

card.name: Bane of the Living
card.text: Morph {X}{B}{B} When Bane of the Living is turned face up, all creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

card.name: Beacon of Destiny
card.text: {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to Beacon of Destiny instead.

card.name: Berserk Murlodont
card.text: Whenever a Beast becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

card.name: Blade Sliver
card.text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+0.

card.name: Blood Celebrant
card.text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Bloodstoke Howler
card.text: Morph {6}{R} When Bloodstoke Howler is turned face up, Beast creatures you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Branchsnap Lorian
card.text: Trample Morph {G}

card.name: Brood Sliver
card.text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may put a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Caller of the Claw
card.text: Flash When Caller of the Claw enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield for each nontoken creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Canopy Crawler
card.text: Amplify 1 {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Canopy Crawler.

card.name: Celestial Gatekeeper
card.text: Flying When Celestial Gatekeeper dies, exile it, then return up to two target Bird and/or Cleric permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Cephalid Pathmage
card.text: Cephalid Pathmage can't be blocked. {T}, Sacrifice Cephalid Pathmage: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Chromeshell Crab
card.text: Morph {4}{U} When Chromeshell Crab is turned face up, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Clickslither
card.text: Haste Sacrifice a Goblin: Clickslither gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Cloudreach Cavalry
card.text: As long as you control a Bird, Cloudreach Cavalry gets +2/+2 and has flying.

card.name: Corpse Harvester
card.text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a Zombie card and a Swamp card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Covert Operative
card.text: Covert Operative can't be blocked.

card.name: Crookclaw Elder
card.text: Flying Tap two untapped Birds you control: Draw a card. Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Crypt Sliver
card.text: All Slivers have "{T}: Regenerate target Sliver."

card.name: Dark Supplicant
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice three Clerics: Search your graveyard, hand, and/or library for a card named Scion of Darkness and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Daru Mender
card.text: Morph {W} When Daru Mender is turned face up, regenerate target creature.

card.name: Daru Sanctifier
card.text: Morph {1}{W} When Daru Sanctifier is turned face up, destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Daru Stinger
card.text: Amplify 1 {T}: Daru Stinger deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Deathmark Prelate
card.text: {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Zombie: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Defender of the Order
card.text: Morph {W}{W} When Defender of the Order is turned face up, creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Deftblade Elite
card.text: Provoke {1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Deftblade Elite this turn.

card.name: Dermoplasm
Dreamborn Muse
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand.

card.name: Drinker of Sorrow
card.text: Drinker of Sorrow can't block. Whenever Drinker of Sorrow deals combat damage, sacrifice a permanent.

card.name: Dripping Dead
card.text: Dripping Dead can't block. Whenever Dripping Dead deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Earthblighter
card.text: {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Destroy target land.

card.name: Echo Tracer
card.text: Morph {2}{U} When Echo Tracer is turned face up, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Elvish Soultiller
card.text: When Elvish Soultiller dies, choose a creature type. Shuffle all creature cards of that type from your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Embalmed Brawler
card.text: Amplify 1 Whenever Embalmed Brawler attacks or blocks, you lose 1 life for each +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Gempalm Incinerator

card.name: Gempalm Polluter

card.name: Gempalm Sorcerer

card.name: Ghastly Remains
